aboutpara: My extensive knowledge in graphic design, paired with a diverse skill set that ranges from programming to cryptocurrency technologies, allows me to approach challenges holistically, fostering creativity and innovation in every project. During my academic journey at the University of Montevallo, not only did I earn accolades such as making the Dean's List and the President's List, but I also delved deep into astrophysics data analysis. By leveraging Python, NumPy, and Jupyter Notebook, I successfully identified 17 habitable exoplanets from NASA's expansive Kepler dataset. This endeavor showcases my analytical capabilities, curiosity, and ability to extract meaningful insights from vast data pools. My entrepreneurial spirit is evident through my ventures like KingzmanCo, where I marry the worlds of graphic design and technology to offer cutting-edge products on Etsy. Leading this endeavor has honed my skills in trend analysis, customer engagement, and business management. Furthermore, my role at King&King Enterprises gave me a front-row seat to the world of cryptocurrency, where I ensured the seamless operation of mining machines and managed financial disbursements with precision. What truly sets me apart is my proficiency in a wide array of programming languages and tools. From developing a Go-Buffalo-based URL shortener to creating user-centric applications using Blazor and React, I constantly challenge myself to stay ahead of the curve. I take pride in my ability to bring ideas to life, and my projects, such as the real-time weather app or the comprehensive expense tracker, are a testament to this passion and capability. Joining your company is not just an opportunity for career advancement, but a chance to contribute to a forward-thinking team, bringing in fresh perspectives and innovative solutions. I believe my diverse experience, hands-on approach, and unwavering commitment to excellence make me a unique and valuable asset to your organization.

resume.tagline: I'm a graphic designer, software developer, data analyst, and prompt engineer
resume.description: Innovative Graphic Designer and Software Developer with a robust academic foundation in computer informatics and hands-on experience in full-stack development, cryptocurrency technologies, database management, as well as graphic design. Known for my problem-solving skills, ability to tackle complex challenges, and commitment to team success. I'll start wherever I have to start. I'll park cars if I have to. The biggest part of judging character is knowing yourself, and I know this: I can do this job, I can. Give me a chance, I won't let you down.

bullets: A diverse range of products including graphic tees, hoodies, doormats, notebooks, and stickers, each with unique designs.
The website supports multiple languages: English, Spanish, and French.
Integration with social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, and TikTok.
Multiple payment options including major credit cards and digital wallets.
Clear links to the website's refund policy, privacy policy, terms of service, and shipping details.
Managed rental properties, including handling repairs, collecting rents, and overseeing lease agreements.
Responsible for property landscaping and maintenance.
Acquired and maintained insurance policies and maintenance contracts to ensure compliance and property protection.

experiences.position: Cryptocurrency Mining Technician at King&King Enterprises LLC
bullets: Managed and maintained client cryptocurrency mining machines, ensuring optimal performance and uptime.
Handled weekly Bitcoin disbursements to clients, backed by comprehensive financial reporting.
Continuously monitored key performance indicators, such as ROI, NPV, and net profit, to guide strategic decision-making.
